description:
Yamatonokami Yasusada happens to encounter his former master, Okita Souji, on the first floor of the Ikeda Inn. Becoming a member of the Shinsengumi, he infiltrates the Ikeda Inn with Okita. Feeling uneasy, Kashuu Kiyomitsu goes after Yasusada...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: December: Our Citadel Is the Hanamaru Today Too
Shiwasu: Bokutachi no Honmaru wa, Kyou mo Hanamaru
師走 僕たちの本丸は, 今日も花丸
